text: Aey logon jo iman laye ho , bachao apne aap ko aur apne ehal-o-ayal ko (yourselves and your kindred) us aag se jis ka indhan (fuel) insaan aur patthar hongey, jispar nihayat tundh-khu (fierce) aur sakht-gir (stern) farishtey mukarrar hongey jo kabhi Allah ke hukum ki na farmani nahin karte aur jo hukm bhi unhein diya jata hai usey baja latey hain
